Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk

Class HddResCloudlet

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.ResCloudlet
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk.HddResCloudlet
public class HddResCloudlet extends ResCloudlet
Extension of ResCloudlet that allows modeling the used I/O operations.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

  • Constructor Summary

    HddResCloudlet(HddCloudlet cloudlet)
